decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( KAT quotation Q0068187 - Received 15/4/15
Application form and supporting photos  - Received 9/4/15
Email correspondence 9/7/15
 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The windows formed in the flank elevation shall be obscure glazed to 1.8m above finished floor level, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  external  walls of the dwelling and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Replacement of single glazed, wooden, sash type windows with replica PVC, double glazed, sash type windows to the rear of the property
